readable.title: 3713922357_e0a013fb97
readable.content: A dirt biker in red speeds on clay road while being videotaped by a man in black . a man wearing a red uniform rides his bicycle up a rocky hill An off road biker is photographed as he performs another stunt in the dirt . A person riding on a dirt bike while someone takes a picture . The guy in red on a dirt bike is getting photographed .
